product.categories_flat: Home & Kitchen > Furniture > Living Room Furniture > Sofas & Couches
feature_bullets: No Assembly Required:Say goodbye to furniture assembly nightmares! our minimalist sofas require no tedious assembly to experience instant comfort. Simply unwrap and relax, no tools required. In just a few moments, your comfy cloud couch is ready to be put to use and reach a state of total luxury within 72 hours.

Modular Sectional Sofa:This U-shaped sectional sofa featuring a sleek design, clean lines, and high-quality plush corduroy Fabric,This minimalist U-shaped sectional set maximizes space when placed against a wall，this corner sofa effortlessly adds a timeless and sophisticated touch to your home. Designed to be the focal point of attention, it's an ideal choice for elevating the ambiance of living rooms, apartments, and bedrooms.

Plush Corduroy Fabric:Sink into the luxurious softness of our plush corduroy fabric. It feels like silk against your skin! It brings serene comfort and warmth, offering endless comfort.The unique texture and soft sheen make it stand out, providing gentle pampering no matter the season. Upgrade your comfort experience with this amazing fabric

Comfortable Chaise Lounge Couch:Indulge in luxurious comfort with our sofa set, offering expansive cloud-like seating.Delight in sublime relaxation with our sleeper sofa featuring a chaise, meticulously crafted with a high-resilience sponge structure.Experience seating that contours to your body, surpassing the comfort of traditional sofas

Flexible & Versatile Living Room Sofa Set: Perfect for living rooms, apartments, bedrooms, guest rooms, and children's play areas, our versatile floor sofa set serves a multitude of functions, encouraging children to play on its luxurious surface. Its modular design facilitates seamless navigation through narrow hallways and tight doorways, ensuring optimal space utilization. Say farewell to relocation concerns, as each piece can be moved independently

top_reviews.title: Gorgeous, Sturdy, and Worth Every Penny!
top_reviews.body: I originally ordered just the couch, and I was so impressed once it arrived that I immediately went back and ordered the ottoman too! The quality completely exceeded my expectations — the couch is sturdy, firm, and supportive, but still super comfortable. The fabric is soft and stylish, and I’ve gotten so many compliments from friends and family already.  It arrived quickly, was incredibly easy to set up, and customer service was excellent beyond expectations — responsive, helpful, and truly cared about my experience.  I’m 100% happy with this purchase. If you’re thinking about it — just do it! It transformed my living space and gave me exactly the comfort and style I was hoping for. Read more
top_reviews.body_html:
I originally ordered just the couch, and I was so impressed once it arrived that I immediately went back and ordered the ottoman too! The quality completely exceeded my expectations — the couch is sturdy, firm, and supportive, but still super comfortable. It arrived quickly, was incredibly easy to set up, and customer service was excellent beyond expectations — responsive, helpful, and truly cared about my experience.

I’m 100% happy with this purchase. If you’re thinking about it — just do it! It transformed my living space and gave me exactly the comfort and style I was hoping for.
Read more

date.raw: Reviewed in the United States on June 21, 2025

top_reviews.title: This couch is worth it. Just don’t put a smaller couch in a big room.
top_reviews.body: Excellent couch. Got the chaise and the ottoman one in black. Expands nicely and very easily. I would put it against a wall so you can put extra pillows behind the main pillows if you are tall. Couch is firm but it will gradually soften as time goes on. If you have small kids this couch is the safest couch as there is nothing hard on it. My 4 yr old grandson loves to jump on it and also take a nap. The fabric is soooo comfortable and soft. Wipe up messes easily. Can move ottoman to middle or one side. It fits a lot of us. It’s worth it. I was tired of looking for couches that were not comfortable and were expensive. Read more
top_reviews.body_html:

date.raw: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2025

top_reviews.title: Really fabulous sofa
top_reviews.body: After a lot of "window shopping" for a new sectional sofa, I saw this one and fell in love with the style and the price. Lived with our new sofa for a couple of weeks now, and we just love it more and more. It is firm, but comfortable, fabric is soft and it is easy to set up and move around. The only downside is that the back of the sofa is too low to completely support the back pillows, but I fixed that with rectangular bolster pillows placed behind the back pillows. This sofa replaces a 12 year old Ikea sectional that was more expensive and not nearly as comfy. I just wish there was a way to order replacement covers in case I want to change the color! Read more
top_reviews.body_html:
After a lot of "window shopping" for a new sectional sofa, I saw this one and fell in love with the style and the price. The only downside is that the back of the sofa is too low to completely support the back pillows, but I fixed that with rectangular bolster pillows placed behind the back pillows. This sofa replaces a 12 year old Ikea sectional that was more expensive and not nearly as comfy. I just wish there was a way to order replacement covers in case I want to change the color!

date.raw: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2025

top_reviews.title: Its a yes!!!!
top_reviews.body: This couch is VERY comfortable! As all the other reviews rave about it is wonderful to not have to assemble anything. Just remove from the box, carefully remove from plastic wrap and allow it time to expand. It's the most favorite spot in our house for the whole family now. Our family of 5 fits very comfortably on it. The backrest is very low, so it's much more for lounging on which suits us perfectly. Its firm but gives in just the right way so no pressure points. Its very sturdy! The fabric is so soft and easy to wipe clean and it has a zipper so you can remove the whole cover! We had an issue with one of our sections and I reached out to the seller and they were extremely prompt in reply and they solved the entire issue without any headache at all! Fantastic product; fantastic customer service. Its a win all around! Read more
top_reviews.body_html:

date.raw: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2025

top_reviews.title: For a cheap couch, worth every penny.
top_reviews.body: Came in four boxes, 2 came one day 2 came the next. Was a little worried when I only got tracking for one box until I asked the seller.  For the price I would say you cannot beat the price. My only complaint is it is a little low to the ground, so probably not good for people who have trouble standing up.  I find it firm and comfortable even before giving it the whole three days to expand fully, don't think it will grow much but it doesn't need to was the perfect size or a large couch someone could sleep on if needed.  I highly recommend for anyone wanting a large couch that might be hard to get into the space if it was a more expensive wood framed couch.  At the end of the day the price and how easy it is to get into a space more expensive furniture would be hard to get into.  The photos do not do justice to the size. Read more
top_reviews.body_html:
Came in four boxes, 2 came one day 2 came the next. Was a little worried when I only got tracking for one box until I asked the seller.

For the price I would say you cannot beat the price.
My only complaint is it is a little low to the ground, so probably not good for people who have trouble standing up.

I find it firm and comfortable even before giving it the whole three days to expand fully, don't think it will grow much but it doesn't need to was the perfect size or a large couch someone could sleep on if needed.

I highly recommend for anyone wanting a large couch that might be hard to get into the space if it was a more expensive wood framed couch.

At the end of the day the price and how easy it is to get into a space more expensive furniture would be hard to get into.

The photos do not do justice to the size.

date.raw: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2025

top_reviews.title: We love this couch
top_reviews.body: Couch is super comfortable and way bigger than expected. My kids love it, easy to move around, very easy to set up, very functional, looks and feels amazing. I was questioning the back support from reading other reviews but we have had no issues, the back pillows are thick and sturdy which really help with the back support. Their customer service is excellent, I had a few questions and they immediately got back to me, and went above and beyond to fix something that wasn’t their fault. Read more

date.raw: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2025

top_reviews.title: Best purchase ever !
top_reviews.body: ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ I was skeptical about ordering this couch, but I’m honestly amazed at how great it turned out. The quality is solid, especially for the price—it feels well-built and durable. The fabric is soft and cozy, while still looking stylish in my living room. It’s super comfortable whether you’re sitting upright or stretching out, and the cushions expanded a lot faster than I expected. In less than 24 hours it already looked full and inviting, and it keeps getting better as it settles.  Another big plus is how much seating space it offers without overwhelming the room—it fits perfectly and feels both functional and modern. Overall, I couldn’t be happier with this purchase. If you’re on the fence, this couch is definitely worth it! Read more
top_reviews.body_html:
⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

date.raw: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2025

top_reviews.title: Great couch
top_reviews.body: Bought this for our son’s apartment and it has not disappointed. The color was just as described, so easy to unpack and let it do its thing with filling and looks amazing in his new apartment. I was surprised at how comfy it is too!! Great quality for the price paid! Read more
